name: LegalHackathon.org
tagline: Host of the ABA-MIT Online Legal Appathon
body:
# Welcome to LegalHackathon.org We are launching tomorrow - April 8th, 2015 - Please check back. Meanwhile... updates informally posted below from time to time: ## Launch Announcement: ABA-MIT Online Legal Appathon
Live Broadcast from Cambridge Innovation Center at MIT in Cambridge, Mass.
Event Hosted by the Code for America Boston Brigade
at
8:30 pm Eastern -- Tuesday, April 7th, 2015
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
